GSD.description:
dmaengine: imx-sdma: Fix a possible memory leak in sdma_transfer_init

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v4.19.272 by commit 80ee99e52936b2c04cc37b17a14b2ae2f9d282ac. For more details please see the references link.

OSV.summary: dmaengine: imx-sdma: Fix a possible memory leak in sdma_transfer_init
